review.title: “A very mixed experience, good projects but an old school harsh management style.”
review.pros: Pros – Good projects, variety of work
review.cons: Cons – Harsh and critical management, little positive feedback, only negativeMr X has sometimes averaged almost a 50% per year employee turnover, excessive even in this industry.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Unless this studio changes it's work culture, it will remain on the B-team. Mr X could be a better studio and a bigger studio, but historically has not been able to hold on to core talent. To get to the next level, Mr X needs to reinvent itself.

review.title: “MrX : Good... if you can stand the heat.”
review.pros: Pros – - Good people trying their hardest made for a good team vibe.- Fun projects if you like horror movies.
review.cons: Cons – - People crying in the studio on a weekly basis is not good for moral.- Despite constant growth, there is a very high turn around of employees.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Take it easy on the artists! Everyone wants to help, it could be a really great studio with just some small tweaks.

review.title: “the good the bad”
review.pros: Pros – - you got paid- you got vacation days- you got sick days
review.cons: Cons – - lots of politic involved- lots of backstabbing among employers- long hours + beyond (no after hours pay)
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Try appreciate and balance out what employers did. After all it's the artists that actually did the works.
